choiceOption.name: mcg_c7_oscsel.
choiceOption.toolTip: Selects the MCG FLL/PLL external reference clock source

binaryOption.name: mcg_c8_cme1.
binaryOption.toolTip: Determines if the clock monitor is enabled for the RTC external clock.\n CME1 bit must be set to a logic 0 before the MCG enters any Stop mode

binaryOption.name: mcg_c8_locre1.
binaryOption.description: OSC1 (RTC) Loss of Clock Reset Enable
binaryOption.toolTip: Determines if a interrupt or a reset request is made following a loss of RTC external reference clock.\n Only has an affect when CME1 is set.

binaryOption.name: mcg_c8_lolre.
binaryOption.description: PLL Loss of Lock Reset Enable
binaryOption.toolTip: Determines if an interrupt or a reset request is made following a PLL loss of lock.\n Only has an affect when CME1 is set

binaryOption.name: mcg_c9_pll_cme.
binaryOption.description: MCG External PLL Clock Monitor Enable
binaryOption.toolTip: Enables the loss of clock monitoring circuit for the MCG External PLL (EXT_PLL) reference clock

binaryOption.name: mcg_c9_pll_locre.
binaryOption.description: MCG External PLL Loss of Clock Reset Enable
binaryOption.toolTip: Determines wheather an interrupt or a reset request is made following a loss of the\n MCG External PLL clock when the MCG is running in PEE mode

binaryOption.name: mcg_c11_pllcs.
binaryOption.toolTip: Controls whether PLL0 or PLL1 (USB1 PFDCLK) is selected as the MCG\n source when CLKS are programmed in PLL Engaged External (PEE) mode.

binaryOption.name: usbphy_power_enable.

binaryOption.name: usbphy_pll_en_usb_clks.
binaryOption.toolTip: Enables the USB clock output from the USB PHY PLL.

choiceOption.toolTip: Allows the PLL to be adjusted for input frequencies of 12, 16 or 24 MHz
